Pals.Name: Sandie
Pals.Description: A Corgi-type Pal with quantum-computing capabilities. She's extremely affectionate, loyal, and always hungry.
Pals.InitialDescription: A wild Sandie is here, zooming in circles and wagging her tail!

Pals.Name: Clyde Capybara
Pals.Description: A Capybara-type Pal known for its chill demeanor and impressive water skills. Its calm presence makes it a favorite among new trainers.
Pals.InitialDescription: A wild Clyde Capybara is here, looking ready to join a trainer!

Pals.Name: Gloop Glorp
Pals.Description: An alien cat-type Pal with mysterious cosmic abilities. Gloop Glorp is curious, mischievous, and always seems to know more than it lets on.
Pals.InitialDescription: A wild Gloop Glorp flutters nearby, pecking at the ground.

Pals.Name: Pibble
Pals.Description: A dog-type Pal with a big head. Pibble always wants to be everyoneâ€™s best friend.
Pals.InitialDescription: A wild Pibble is here, grinning with a giant head and ready to play!

Pals.Name: Bark Zuckerburg
Pals.Description: A dog-type Pal with a talent for technology. Bark Zuckerburg is always plotting his next big app.
Pals.InitialDescription: A wild Bark Zuckerburg is here, tapping away at a tiny smartphone!

Pals.Name: Morty
Pals.Description: A dog-type Pal who's a nerd for Sandie. He collects Sandie comics and dreams of meeting her!
Pals.InitialDescription: A wild Morty is here, adjusting his glasses and quoting Sandie facts!

Pals.Name: Lostling
Pals.Description: A ghost-type Pal that wanders aimlessly. It's always looking for its way back home.
Pals.InitialDescription: A lostling is here, wandering aimlessly.

Pals.Name: Smiley
Pals.Description: A ghost-type Pal with a big smiley face. Smiley is always happy!
Pals.InitialDescription: A wild Smiley is here, grinning with a big smiley face!
